Class Body

java.lang.Object
us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Body
public class Body extends Object
Stores and updates physical information about a body. Updates information such as position and velocity as time passes and as forces are applied to the body.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<Vector3D>
    gravityForces
    Vector to store the current gravitational forces acting on the body.

  • Field Details

    • gravityForces

      public ArrayList<Vector3D> gravityForces
      Vector to store the current gravitational forces acting on the body.

  • Constructor Details

    • Body

      public Body(Vector3D pos, Vector3D vel, double mass, double density, String name, Color c)
      Class constructor with all values specified by user. Assigns specified values to their corresponding fields and generates an id and gravity forces array for the body. Adds another vector to each body's gravity force array.
      Parameters:
      pos - initial position of the body
      vel - initial velocity of the body
      mass - initial mass of the body
      name - name of the body

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(double millis)
      Updates the body's physical motion vectors. Resets the acceleration factor and sets it based on the mass and the gravity forces currently acting on the body. The velocity is updated based on the acceleration and the position is updated based on the velocity.

      The trail is updated based on both direction change and distance traveled. It will add a point to the trail if either:

      • The direction of the body's velocity has changed more than [trail resolution] degrees from the direction of velocity at the previous trail point.
      • THe body has traveled more than a predetermined distance since the previous trail point. Scaled to the size of the system.

    • collision

      public void collision(Vector3D pos, Vector3D vel, double mass)
      Modifies this body's attributes based on collision information. Adjusts the position and velocity based on the other body's position and velocity scaled to the bodies' relative masses. The masses are then merged.
      Parameters:
      pos - other body's position
      vel - other body's velocity
      mass - other body's mass

    • getTrail

      public ArrayList<Vector3D> getTrail()
      Getter method for the body's trail data.
      Returns:
      Returns the ArrayList of trail points.
